page.title: 17THE RAILWAY INN
page.content: The Railway Inn is the nearest pub to our school.As well as selling alcohol they also sell soft drinks and do meals at night.There is no beer garden,but there is a patiuo on the front with tables and chairs for the customers. The pub was built 150 years ago and is now owned by Ansells Brewery and run by Mr and Mrs Machin who have been there now for 10 years.He opens the pub at 12 in the morning till 3p.m. and then from 7p.m. till 11p.m.He is so busy,he has to employ 10 part time staff to help run the business.The pub also has darts leagues,dominoes,a pool table and video games. Although the building is a pub now Mr Machin told us that years ago it used to be a small shop until extensions were built and it was converted into a pub. Class B3
